features: ⚠️【SPECIAL NOTE】This kit is only compatible with 1-Tank system triangle microfiber spin mop, not with 2-Tank system! Includes 1 set of 60 inches 5-section multi-size combo handle, 2 microfiber Triangle spin mop head refills and 1 mop base.

✅【Easy to use】The handle can be combined into multiple sizes: 60 inches, 48 inches, 36 inches, 25 inches, 15 inches. you can combine it into different sizes according to your height, usage habits and scenarios. Enough comfort will make your cleaning job very easy.

✅【Perfect Upgrade】Mop head refills are made of 100% microfiber with high softness and super absorbency. Longer microfiber strips are designed to increase cleaning area. More microfiber strips are retained at the bottom to avoid scratching the cleaning surface at the base.Get 3 months of optimal cleaning results and 12 months of maximum use.

✅【Wide Applications】Suitable for deep cleaning of smooth surfaces such as wood, tile, laminate, marble and other sealed hard floors. As well as cleaning glass and cars. Can be used dry or wet. Dry mopping is used to clean hair and dust. Wet mop for stain removal. Meet your multiple cleaning needs.
✅【Important Note】If you are not satisfied with the quality of our products or how they work, please let us know and we will offer you a return or refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mop handle- and mop heads !
reviews.reviewText: I glad I purchased this as my old one had broken and although it was the original that came with my Oced-- mop bucket, it was not very sturdy and it pinched my hand at the connections-every time I used it.I like this one much better- it seems to have a lot more weight and the handle does not pinch my hand- like my old one did. The mop heads are great also. Two came in this order and the ones I have from the previous mop do fit in this mop just as well. It is a good deal since I had to buy one- and did not need a mop bucket at this time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the extra money
reviews.reviewText: These are the best microfiber mop heads even better than the original ones that came with the bucket. These are much thicker and larger I feel they clean better! The pole extents to 60” unlike the original pole that only extends to 48”

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent replacement for cheaply made original
reviews.reviewText: The handle pieces screw together and you make as long or short as you want. Having multiple heads is nice so you change it more frequently. The only thing that would make it perfect, in my opinion is if it had a grip that allowed the mop to spin inside it while spinning it, preventing your hand from potentially getting burned or rubbed while holding it. Otherwise, quality is fair and heads are pretty easy to pop off. You can stand on the mop head “strings” on either side and jerk the mop handle up to remove cover, and simply put new cover on floor and press handle into it to click.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I can't say enough about this replacement product. Fits perfectly, mop head is better than the original and pads snap into place easily and are so fluffy. Shipment was quick and arrived as expected. Love it !!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the original.
reviews.reviewText: Listen this thing holds up. Better than the original one that came in our set. And my wife uses these. I've never seen a floor moped so much. This really holds up and a great value to. They are cheaper here than that Chinese site temu. And you'll get it in a couple days instead of a couple weeks. Just buy it. Your wife and bare feet will thank you.

reviews.reviewerName: Very thin hard to get wrinkles out from packaging.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cheap , duster heads are cheap. Works for dust only. easy to assemble

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the Original!
reviews.reviewText: The original handle that comes with this style of mop is collapsible. Slide into itself for compact storage. However, after a couple of months of use, the handle just won't stay extended. This mop replacement fixed the issue. Works great and no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best bang for you buck!
reviews.reviewText: Inexpensive and so far seems sturdy enough. The bigger mop head is a huge plus. If you’re a tall person like myself you’ll really like using this as the handle is really long. Would definitely buy again!
